column5:
This is my first Hooptober. For details read Cinemonster's Hooptober Se7en List. Putting together the list has been a little tricky. 1) I'd like to keep it to movies I haven't already seen, and 2) I'm trying to put together a list of movies I know I have access to (or will have access to when the time comes). Due to these stipulations on my part I may need to change a few movies around depending on availability over the course of October. Rules: - 1 Tobe Hooper Film
- Body Bags
- 6 countries
- Kwaidan (Japan) - Angst (Austria) - Eyes Without a Face (France) - Vampyr (Germany) - [REC] (Spain) - Peninsula (Korea)
- 6 decades
- Vampyr (1930s) - The Curse of Frankenstein (1950s) - Eyes Without a Face (1960s) - Blacula (1970s) - The Toxic Avenger Part II (1980s) - Body Bags (1990s) - Final Destination 3 (2000s) - Crimson Peak (2010s) - Peninsula (2020s)
- 7 2nd films of franchises
- Scream Blacula Scream - [REC]2 - Dawn of the Dead - Peninsula - Tetsuo II: Body Hammer - The Toxic Avenger Part II - Brahms: The Boy II
- 4 body horror films
- Tetsuo II: Body Hammer - Slither - The Toxic Avenger Part II
- 2 films from this year
- Peninsula - Brahms: The Boy II
- 3 disease based films
- Peninsula - The Crazies - Contracted
- 1 highest rated horror film from the 50s that you haven't seen and can access.
- Diabolique
- 1 film that is set entirely inside one location
- [REC]
- 1 Invisible Person film
- The Invisible Man (2018)
- 1 Non Dracula Hammer Film
- The Curse of Frankenstein
- 2 films with a black director or predominantly black cast or lead.
- Blacula - Eve's Bayou
- 1 film with a movie theater in it.
- The Invisible Man (2018)
I haven't seen any of these before so am excited and hoping I can pull this off without a hitch.
